main.bio: Hi there! I am Keshav, a passionate full stack developer with two years of professional experience in the field of software engineering. My journey in this industry has allowed me to become well-versed in both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to create robust and efficient web applications. I thrive on the challenges presented by complex projects and enjoy crafting intuitive user interfaces using technologies like React and Angular. On the back-end, I excel in designing scalable server-side architectures using Node.js and Django. My insatiable curiosity drives me to constantly learn and stay up to date with emerging technologies. With a problem-solving mindset and a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions, I'm always ready to take on new projects and push the boundaries of innovation in software development.
